itinerary.title: Arrival in Manali
itinerary.description: Arrive in Manali and check into your hotel. Spend the day exploring the local markets and cafes.

itinerary.title: Manali to Jispa
itinerary.description: Embark on a scenic drive to Jispa, crossing the Rohtang Pass.

itinerary.title: Jispa to Leh
itinerary.description: Continue your journey to Leh, the capital of Ladakh.
